name: Thieving Elves
description:
Santa has a revolt on his hands and just before Christmas! His elves have given up and thrown in the towel at crunch time. Not only that, they're after Santa's presents and want him gone! Help him to subdue the correct elf work forces with the correct powder bombs to return them to their normal ways!

A festive entry into Secret Santa Jam 2020, by Ben Wright Design. This was made for Aiden/Spidoo. Enjoy!

CONTROLS:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Scroll / 1,2,3 - Cycle Weapons

Merry Christmas! :)
